Halucigen takign to the sky a large smile on his face.  The guns 
firing were nothing once he was in the open sky then "Thunk"

Halucigen hit the shield falling.  Luckily his immediate change in 
direction tricked most the guns shot ringing above him and the 
missiles exploding on the shield forcing Halucigen down even 
faster.  A couple shots then hit him in the back thrusting him into 
an awkward position as he hit hte ground.  
Once again giving a command mentaly, but weakly.
'Idiot what are you doing.  Get me outside of the shields and hand 
me over to the bot waiting for me, Shredder. NOW' his mental 
command finished.
